Unusually, each company of Landsknecht directly elected a complement of Gemeinämter, or officers who would represent their interests as well as oversee the administration of the company.

This is a German/Landsknecht Offiziersstab (Leaders) unit of thirteen strips (17 figures total). You will recieve thirteen leaders (a mix of ls16a–j, ls01a, ls02a and ls05a).
